backend/main.mo: Actor stores three sets (principals and text) and provides add/query methods returning principal IDs as text arrays.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing UI feature changes, affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing various frontend Tambola feature files including state, storage, components, and voice modules.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment guide outlining prerequisites and steps for building and deploying the Tambola app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining light/dark theme CSS variables and global background/foreground settings.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining metadata, favicon, root div, and script loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component wiring game state, controls, history section, and voice announcements into a responsive layout.
frontend/src/features/tambola/components: UI card with draw, reset, and auto‑draw controls including interval slider and confirmation dialog.
Scrollable grid showing reversed call history with latest number highlighted in red.
Wrapper combining LastNumberDisplay with HistoryPanel to show recent draw and full history.
Dialog UI to record, preview, and delete host voice clips for numbers 1–90 with recording and playback state management.
Displays the last drawn number or a placeholder, and shows a completion message when all numbers are called.
Provides a button and confirmation dialog to start a new Tambola game.
Renders a 1–90 grid highlighting numbers that have been called.
Allows manual or spoken entry of up to 15 numbers and verifies them against called numbers with success or error feedback.
Panel to configure voice announcements, reading mode, source priority, and open the voice recording manager.
frontend/src/features/tambola/storage.ts: Handles load/save of persisted game state, and provides initial state creators for game and auto-draw settings.
frontend/src/features/tambola/types.ts: Defines Tambola game, auto-draw, persisted state structures, and game action types.
frontend/src/features/tambola/useTambola: Custom hook managing Tambola game logic, draws, undo, auto-draw, new game, reset, and state persistence.
frontend/src/features/tambola/verify/par: Parses a comma/space‑separated string into unique valid numbers between 1 and 90.
Parses spoken transcripts into up to 15 unique numbers (1-90), handling digits, number words, and compound words.
Provides SpeechSynthesis-based TTS helpers, selects best matching voice, and exposes voice match status and speech playback.
frontend/src/features/tambola/voice/type: Defines types for voice settings, reading modes, source priority, and playback steps.
frontend/src/features/tambola/voice/useH: React hook for recording microphone audio and storing clips in IndexedDB.
frontend/src/features/tambola/voice/useS: React hook wrapping browser speech recognition, managing transcript, errors, and start/stop control.
frontend/src/features/tambola/voice/useV: Controls number announcements using recordings or TTS, building playback sequences based on reading mode.
Manages voice settings state and persistence, including enable toggle, reading mode, and priority.
frontend/src/features/tambola/voice/voic: Handles playback of audio blobs with an AudioContext, including unlocking and stopping audio.
IndexedDB storage layer for saving, loading, deleting, and listing recorded number clips.
Loads and saves voice settings to localStorage with default fallback.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including loading identities, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind CSS layers, theme variables, dark mode styles, and background theming for the app.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and the Internet Identity provider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with custom colors, themes, plugins, animations, and design tokens.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s current state, features, and pending requests for adding a recent draw number UI box.
